name: SP!TE
summary: SP!TE is set in post apocalyptic times where nuclear war is going on throughout the globe, with zombies and monsters running everywhere! SP!TE is a wave based survival game. The waves go up to 25! If you can get to 26 you have beat one of the levels. there are currently 7 levels to choose from. all sorts of ammo, health and bomb spawns, and weapons to choose from throughout the maps.
